SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: SELECT ID, `Name` AS 'Name',Code,Description, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(`ModificationDate`,`CreationDate`),'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') AS OperatioinDate FROM `TB_MB_AdvertiseType` WHERE `Status`=TRUE <%= AND Name LIKE @@Name@@%> ORDER BY OperatioinDate DESC <%= LIMIT @@StartSize@@ , @@PageSize@@%>; SELECT COUNT(1) AS total FROM `TB_MB_AdvertiseType` WHERE `Status`=TRUE <%= AND Name LIKE @@Name@@%>;
UPDATE TB_MB_AdvertiseType SET STATUS=FALSE WHERE ID=@@ID@@

SELECT ar.`ID`,ar.`TypeCode`,ar.`Name`,ar.`ImageUrl`,"" AS FullUrl,DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(ar.`ModificationDate`,ar.`CreationDate`),'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') AS OperatioinDate, ar.`Sort`,art.`Name` AS TypeName,ar.GoUrl FROM `TB_MB_Advertise` ar JOIN `TB_MB_AdvertiseType` art ON ar.`TypeCode`=art.`Code` WHERE 1=1 AND ar.status=TRUE <%= AND (art.`Name` LIKE @@Search@@ or ar.`Name` LIKE @@Search@@) %> ORDER BY IFNULL(ar.`ModificationDate`,ar.`CreationDate`) DESC <%= LIMIT @@StartSize@@ , @@PageSize@@%>; SELECT COUNT(1) AS total FROM `TB_MB_Advertise` ar JOIN `TB_MB_AdvertiseType` art ON ar.`TypeCode`=art.`Code` WHERE 1=1 AND ar.status=TRUE <%= AND (art.`Name` LIKE @@Name@@ or ar.`Name` LIKE @@Search@@) %>;
SELECT ar.`ID`,ar.`TypeCode`,ar.`Name`,ar.`ImageUrl`,"" AS FullUrl,ar.`Sort`,ar.`GoUrl` FROM `TB_MB_Advertise` ar WHERE ar.ID=@@ID@@
